/******************************************************************************

                            Online Java Compiler.
                Code, Compile, Run and Debug java program online.
Write your code in this editor and press "Run" button to execute it.

*******************************************************************************/
import java.util.*;
public class Main
{
	public static void main(String[] args) {
	  
	  int n=10;
	  
	  ArrayList<String> answer = getStairPath(n);
	  System.out.print(answer);
	  
	}
	
	public static ArrayList<String> getStairPath(int n)
	{
	    
	    if(n==0){
	        ArrayList<String> bres = new ArrayList<>();
	        bres.add("");
	        return bres;
	    }
	    
	    if(n<0){
	        ArrayList<String> bres = new ArrayList<>();
	        return bres;
	    }
	    
	    ArrayList<String> paths1 = getStairPath(n-1);     //FAITH 1
	    ArrayList<String> paths2 = getStairPath(n-2);     //FAITH 2
	    ArrayList<String> paths3 = getStairPath(n-3);     //FAITH 3
	    
	    
	    ArrayList<String> paths=new ArrayList<>();
	    
	    for(String path:paths1){
	        paths.add("1"+path);
	    }
	  
	    for(String path:paths2){
	        paths.add("2"+path);
	    }
	    
	    for(String path:paths3){
	        paths.add("3"+path);
	    }
	    
	    
	    return paths;
	}
}









---------------------------

Input: 4
Output:
[1111, 112, 121, 13, 211, 22, 31]



Input: 10
Output:
[1111111111, 111111112, 111111121, 11111113, 111111211, 11111122, 11111131, 111112111, 11111212, 11111221, 1111123, 11111311, 1111132, 111121111, 11112112, 11112121, 1111213, 11112211, 1111222,
